alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Florence, south central Dillon, Marion and northern Williamsburg Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Claussen to Hyman to near Lake City to near Kingstree to near Salters. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent to continuous cloud to ground lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar and Satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Lake City, Kingstree, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Hemingway, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Cades, Poston, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Indiantown, Gresham, Henry, Hyman, Hannah, Francis Marion University and Friendfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
